question.text: Ajay is driving through an area where there are many pedestrians. There is a turning ahead with a red-bordered round sign, showing a car with a motorcycle above it. Outside town, the single carriageway road has a double unbroken white centre line. Ajay sees several signs with brown backgrounds. He approaches a traffic light signal which is showing green. The signal changes just before Ajay reaches it.
question.part: What details would Ajay find on the brown signs?
